goalSetting.title: Setha Umgomo Wakho Wokuqala
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Uhambo ngalunye ludinga indawo yokufika. Yimuphi umgomo wakho wokuqala wezezimali?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetha okukodwa ukuze uqale. Ungakushintsha kamuva.

goalSet.title: Umgomo Usethiwe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Kuhle! Usethile umgomo wakho ku-{{amount}} we-{{goalTitle}}. Ake siqale ukufunda ngerenti ehlanganisiwe!

simulate.title: Fanekisa
simulate.subtitle: Bona ukuthi ukutshalwa kwemali kwakho kungakhula/kuncipha kanjani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Ubungozi obuphezulu, imbuyiselo enamandla engaba khona
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Inkokhelo incane kakhulu ukukhokha isikweletu noma isikhathi siphelile nesamba esisele:
simulate.add200Desc: Khokha u-R200 ngokweqile ngenyanga ukuze unciphise inzuzo nezinyanga.
simulate.add500Desc: Khokha u-R500 ngokweqile ngenyanga ukuze ukhokhe ngokushesha.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Zungeza inkokhelo yakho ukuze ifinyelele ku-R100 elandela.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Yenza inani elifana nenkokhelo eyodwa eyengeziwe ngenyanga ngonyaka.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Ukutshalwa kwemali kwakho kungakhula kube ngaphezu kokuphindwe kabili kwezinikelo zakho ngokukhula okuhlanganisiwe!
simulate.timeInsight: Ngokuba neminyaka engu-{{years}}, unikeza inzuzo ehlanganisiwe isikhathi esanele ukuba isebenze.
simulate.contributionInsight: Umsebenzi omuhle! Ukunikela ngo-R{{amount}} ngenyanga kukubeka endleleni eqinile yokufinyelela imigomo yakho.
simulate.debtInsight: Ukukhulisa inkokhelo yakho ngisho nangenani elincane kunganciphisa kakhulu izinyanga zokukhokha futhi kunciphise inani lerenzi eliphelele.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Ukugcina: inzuzo yonyaka ivame ukwanda njengoba ibhalansi ikhula (ihlanganisiwe).
simulate.debtTableHint: Isikweletu: inzuzo yonyaka ivame ukuncipha njengoba inani eliyinhloko likhokhwa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Lokhu kuwukulinganisela okulula ngenjongo yokufundisa. Imbuyiselo yangempela ingahluka kakhulu ngenxa yokushintshashintsha kwemakethe, izimali ekhokhwayo nezinye izinto. Ukusebenza kwangaphambilini akugcini isiqiniseko semiphumela yesikhathi esizayo.
simulate.chartError: Ingxenye yeshadi yehlulekile ukubonisa. Lokhu kwenzeka kaningi uma imodyuli yendabuko ye-react-native-svg ingaxhunyiwe/ingafakwanga ekwakheni kwedivayisi. Usengasebenzisa i-simulator ngaphandle kweshadi.
simulate.chartFixTips: Amathiphu okulungisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, bese uhlanza & uphinde wakhe. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, bese uphinde wakhe.
simulate.scenarioProjection: Le ndlela yokulinganisa ye-{{scenarioName}} imodela imbuyiselo yonyaka engu-{{returnRate}}% ehlanganisiwe ngenyanga. Ngokokufaka kwakho kwamanje ngaphezu kweminyaka engu-{{years}} {{yearUnit}}, inani lakho elilinganiselwe lingaba ngu-{{total}} okungu-{{growth}} ukukhula okuhlanganisiwe.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Okushoyo: Indlela ye-{{scenarioName}} ivame ukuqondisela cishe ku-{{returnRate}}% ngonyaka ngokwesilinganiso esikhathini eside, ngokwamukela ukushintshashintsha okungu-{{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Imbuyiselo yangempela iyahluka; lokhu akuyona isiqiniseko. Yisebenzise ukuze uzwe ukuthi izinga nesikhathi kushintsha kanjani imiphumela.

compounding.title: Umlingo Wokukhula Kwemali
compounding.description: Funda ukuthi imali yakho ingakhula kanjani ngesivinini esikhulu ngesikhathi ngenxa yamandla enzalo ephindaphindiwe.

concept.title: Umqondo
concept.content: Cabanga ukuthi unesihlahla semali. Inzalo ephindaphindiwe ifana nokutshala imbewu eyehla esihlahleni sakho, ukuze zikhule zibe zihlahla zemali ezintsha.

coreIdea.title: Umqondo Omkhulu
coreIdea.content: Uthola inzalo emalini yakho. Bese uthola *inzalo enzalweni yakho*. Lowo wumlingo.

interactive.title: Kubona Ekusebenzeni
interactive.content: Ake sikubone ekusebenzeni. Hudula isilaydani ukuze ubone ukuthi utshalomali lwe-R10,000 lukhula kanjani ku-8% nzalo.

emergencyFund.title: Isikhwama Sezingozi Sichazulwe
emergencyFund.description: Kungani udinga isikhwama sezingozi nokuthi kumalini okumele ukulondoloze ngaphambi kokutshala imali.

why.title: Kungani Uzikhathalele?
why.content: Impilo iyenzeka‚Äîukulahlekelwa umsebenzi, ukulungiswa kwezimoto, amabhili okwelapha. Isikhwama sezingozi sikuvimbela ukuthi ungene esikweletini (noma uthengise utshalomali ngesikhathi esingalungile).

howMuch.title: Kumalini?
howMuch.content: Umthetho ojwayelekile: izinyanga ezi-3‚Äì6 zezindleko ezibalulekile. Qala ngenjongo encane (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), bese wakhile.

interactive.title: Injongo Yakho
interactive.content: Hudula ukubeka izinto ezibalulekile zenyanga yonke (isiqashi, ukudla, ukuhamba). Sizokubonisa injongo yezingozi zezinyanga ezi-3‚Äì6.

quiz.title: Ukuhlola Okusheshayo
quiz.question: Kuphi okumele kugcinwe khona isikhwama sezingozi?

firstPortfolio.title: Ukwakha Iphothifoliyo Yakho Yokuqala
firstPortfolio.description: Dala iphothifoliyo yotshalomali ehlukahlukene evumelana nezinhloso zakho nokuthuthukisa ubungozi.

goals.title: Qala Ngezinhloso
goals.content: Isikhathi + inhloso = ukwabiwa. Izinhloso zesikhathi esifushane ‚Üí izimpahla eziphephile. Izinhloso zesikhathi eside ‚Üí izimpahla zokukhula okuningi.

diversify.title: Ukuhlukanisa
diversify.content: Hlanganisa izinhlobo zezimpahla (amasheya, amabhondi, imali) nezindawo ukuze oyedwa ongaphumeleli angacwilisi umkhumbi wonke.

interactive.title: Zama Ukwabiwa
interactive.content: Nyakaza ama-slider amasheya/amabhondi/imali. Bona ukuguquguquka okufanekisiwe kanye nembuyiselo yesikhathi eside iguquka ngesikhathi sangempela.

riskReturn.title: Ukuqonda Ubungozi Nenzuzo
riskReturn.description: Thola ukuhlobana phakathi kobungozi namathuba enzuzo ekubhadaleni.

intro.title: Yini Ubungozi?
intro.content: Ubungozi ukuthi imali yakho engayibhadalela inganyuka kangakanani noma iwele. Ubungozi obukhudlwana bungasho inzuzo enkulu ‚Äî kodwa nanokudla okukhudlwana.

tradeoff.title: Ukushintshana
tradeoff.content: Impahla eziphephile (njengecash) zinenzuzo encinyane. Impahla ezinobungozi (njengama-stock) zingakhula kabanzi ngesikhathi kodwa zinyakaza kabanzi.

interactive.title: Khetha Indlela Yakho
interactive.content: Nyakaza isilayi phakathi kwe"kuphephile" ne"bungozi" ukubona ukuthi ukuguquka nenzuzo yesikhathi eside kungaguquka kanjani.

options.A: Inzuzo enkulu ihlala isho ubungozi obuncinyane
options.B: Inzuzo enkulu engaba khona ivame ukuza nobungozi obukhudlwana

taxEfficient.title: Ukubhadalela Okusebenza Ngemithelo
taxEfficient.description: Funda ngemidakada engeniwo yemithelo / enenzuzo yemithelo nokubeka okuhlakaniphile ukugcina okuningi kwezokungenisa kwakho.

wrappers.title: Sebenzisa Isigqubho
wrappers.content: Emidakada enenzuzo yemithelo njenge-RA, ivikela ukukhula/izabelo emithelweni ethile.

placement.title: Indawo Yempahla
placement.content: Beka impahla engasebenzi kakuhle ngemithelo (njengamafandhi amabhondi, abakhokhi bezabelo ezinkulu) emidakadeni evikelwe yimithelo kuqala.

interactive.title: Ukubeka Okuhlakaniphile
interactive.content: Hudula amafandhi ku-"Anemithelo" vs "Anenzuzo Yemithelo" amabhakede. Bona ukubuyela kwangemumva kwemithelo kuyathuthuka.

quiz.title: Ukuhlola Ngokushesha
quiz.question: Yiliphi ihambelo elivame ukusebenza KAKHUDLWANA ngemithelo?

options.A: Ukuphethe amafandhi amabhondi emidakadeni enenzuzo yemithelo
options.B: Ukuphethe amafandhi amabhondi emidakadeni ye-brokerage enemithelo

reward.notEligibleMessage: Qedela yoke impumelelo bona uthathe umvuzo wakho!

takeYourTime.title: Zinike isikhathi
takeYourTime.description: Ungarhabeli ezifundweni. Zinike isikhathi sokuzwisisa ummongo ngamunye.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Ukuzilolonga kwenza uphelele
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Buyela ezifundweni uzame iingcenye ezisebenzisanako kanengi.

learnDaily.title: Funda qobe langa
learnDaily.description: Sebenzisa imizuzu emi-5-10 qobe langa bona wakhe ilwazi lakho leemali.
